title: Bring back Duo and Solo Queue

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/6WuZKauE-new-champ-select-update

>Teams made of solos and duos are matched against a premade 4 or premade 5 only 0.21% of the time, and players queueing solo get teamed up with 4 man premades 3% of the time.

it still is basically soloq, just with a different champ select. or is the champ select the part you want back?
